introduction: In this video, the speaker discusses the changing job outlook for data science and the importance of understanding the skills required for the role. The speaker emphasizes the need for data scientists to be able to build applications and put together all the pieces to create a final product, as well as being proficient in traditional analytics and machine learning architectures. The video concludes with a massive piece of advice for viewers to focus on building their skills in data science and analytics to set themselves apart from the competition.

sections.title: Section 1: Data Science Job Outlook
content: Data science jobs are not close to dying, with more and more data being generated and insights being gained from it.
People still need humans to interpret and analyze the data, even as machine learning models become more advanced.
The job outlook for data scientists is changing rapidly, with new skills becoming increasingly important.
The speaker encourages viewers to stay up-to-date with the latest developments in data science to remain competitive.

sections.title: Section 2: Importance of Full Application Building
content: Building applications is becoming more important for data scientists as traditional analytics tasks become more efficient.
Data scientists need to understand how all the pieces of an application fit together to create a final product.
The speaker emphasizes the need for data scientists to have a strong foundation in building applications to succeed in the field.
Building applications also allows data scientists to expand upon a company's skill set and create their own technologies.

sections.title: Section 3: Advanced Machine Learning Architectures
content: Advanced machine learning architectures are becoming increasingly important for data scientists to understand.
Data scientists need to be able to expand upon a company's skill set and create their own technologies.
The speaker encourages viewers to focus on learning advanced machine learning architectures to stay competitive.
Learning advanced machine learning architectures allows data scientists to create more sophisticated models and applications.

sections.title: Section 4: Importance of Traditional Analytics
content: Traditional analytics is still important for data scientists to understand.
Data scientists need to be able to analyze and interpret data to make informed decisions.
The speaker emphasizes the need for data scientists to have a strong foundation in traditional analytics.
Traditional analytics also allows data scientists to gain a deeper understanding of the data and its insights.

sections.title: Section 5: Massive Piece of Advice
content: The speaker offers a massive piece of advice for viewers to focus on building their skills in data science and analytics.
Data scientists need to be able to build applications, understand machine learning architectures, and analyze data.
The speaker emphasizes the need for data scientists to stay up-to-date with the latest developments in the field.
By focusing on these skills, data scientists can set themselves apart from the competition and succeed in their careers.
